alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Cherry County through 145 AM CDT... At 100 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Cody to near Medicine Lake. Movement was east-northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cody, Kilgore, Nenzel, Medicine Lake, Merritt Reservoir, Eli, Steer Creek Campground, Anderson Bridge State Wildlife Management Area, Indian Hill and Schoolhouse Lake. This includes Highway 20 between mile markers 142 and 184. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for north central Nebraska.
